Description: * Urn NW lead requirement increased from 8% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Cooldown reduced from 45s to 40s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} cast range increased from 13m to 14m
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} rage per weapon damage increased from 0.015 to 0.017
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} drain rate reduced from 0.3 to 0.25
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} stacks no longer decrease on death

* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} now gives stacks based on dying heroes hurt by {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} damage with a 12 second buffer (previously anyone hit by the bomb would automatically grant stacks)
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} damage per stack increased from 3% to 5%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} spirit power damage scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T1 improved from -7.5s to -8s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} cooldown reduced from 19s to 18s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Movespeed spirit scaling reduced from 0.04 to 0.032
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Bullet damage spirit scaling reduced from 0.13 to 0.12
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Ice Path}} cooldown increased from 38s to 42s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Mini Turret}}s Spirit Resist reduced from 80% to 70%
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Wall}} cooldown increased from 37s to 46s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Wall}} T2 cooldown improved from -14s to -23s
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|{{PageRef|Pulse}} Grenade}} T3 reduced from +1m per {{PageRef|Pulse}} to +0.75m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} DPS increased from 110 to 120
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} cooldown reduced from 90s to 85s
